title: It is time I told you the truth.
body:
Yes, you.

Every single account on here is mine. You are the only person on GD who is not me.

I have created this entire forum and trolled you this entire time, making you think we were a community. You have literally just been talking to all of my smurfs since you posted on GD.

I am kinda bored now, and thought I would tell you.
